title: Essential Elements 4 Pack: Men's Dry-Fit Sweat Resistant Active Athletic Performance Shorts
description: Comfortable Athletic Men’s Shorts - Having the right activewear helps you make the most out of your workout. That's why we designed our men's athletic shorts with all the features needed to help you perform your best. The stretchable elastic waist and drawstring allow you to adjust the workout shorts to fit you well so that it stays in place while providing comfort. Our men's sports shorts are knee-length, the correct measurement so you can stretch, jump, and run at ease.

Quick-Dry Gym Shorts for Men - Perspiration can hold you back from moving comfortably. Our men's gym shorts won't let you sweat this small stuff, thanks to its quick-dry technology. We use 100% polyester fabric for our workout shorts for men, which is a moisture-wicking material. Sweat dries up faster, preventing your athletic gym shorts from getting drenched and heavy.

Performance-Knit Fabric - When it comes to the best fabric for active men's shorts, polyester provides the most benefits. Not only does it dry quickly but also allows for excellent mobility. Our athletic shorts for men give you freedom of movement. It's breathable, lightweight, and durable, perfect for hours of intense workouts, sports activity, and strength training.

Stylish & Functional - Every man needs a nice pair of workout shorts that's both stylish and functional. Our men's athletic gym shorts are available in modern, versatile designs that look good with any top. These basketball shorts have pockets big enough to fit your essentials like wallets, keys, or even your smartphone.
